Title: When I click a list, it should go to the list page
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to click the list so that I can view the items on my list

**Given** a user is on the homepage
**When** they click on a list name
**Then** they are routed to a new page
Comment:
Commit by Pivotal
https://github.com/pivotal-izabela-gomes/angular2-interview/commit/8ce2ce586f6cd94ea622c1e88f0a8073b4d4f31b

[#139557165] Added navigation to list page (Izabela Gomes - Feb 14, 2017)

Title: List page should have button to return to homepage
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to click in a button to go back to the homepage

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** they click on homepage button
**Then** they should be routed to the homepage

Title: List page should show the list items from database
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to see previous items on my list

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** the page loads
**Then** they should see all the items stored in the database

Title: User should be able to add an item to a list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to add an item to a list

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** they fill out the input field
**And** click on the add button
**Then** a new item is saved in the database
**And** a new item is shown in the list

Title: User should be able to delete an item from the list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to delete an item from a list

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** they click on the delete button
**Then** the item is removed from the database
**And** the item is not shown in the list anymore

Title: Clicking an item should open a grocery item page
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to click on the list items

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** they click on an item
**Then** they are routed to the grocery item page
**And** they see their grocery item name and id

Title: User should be able to edit an item in the list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to edit an existing item in the list

**Given** a user is on the grocery item page
**When** they change the item name
**And** click the save button
**Then** they are returned to the list page
**And** the name is updated in the database
**And** they see the name updated on the list page

Title: User should be able to change the name of a list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to change the name of my list

**Given** a user is on the grocery item page
**When** they click the list name
**Then** the field become editable

**Given** a user has changed the list name
**When** they press enter
**Then** the list name is changed in the database
**And** the list name is updated on the grocery item page

Title: User should be able to add a new list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to add a new list

**Given** a user is on the homepage
**When** they fill out the input field
**And** click on the add button
**Then** a new list is saved in the database
**And** a new list is shown on the homepage

Title: User should be able to delete a list
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to delete a list

**Given** a user is on the homepage
**When** they click on the delete button
**Then** the list is removed from the database
**And** the list is not shown in the homepage anymore

Title: User should be able to search for an item
Description:
As a user of the grocery app, I want to be able to search for an item in a list, so that I don't have to scroll to find the item

**Given** a user is on the list page
**When** they start typing in the search box
**Then** they should see all the items that match that text

**Given** a user is typing in the search box
**When** they click on a search result
**Then** they are redirected to the item page
